data.text: @RafaellaAsugi Thanks for sharing your experience and insight, Rafaella. Take care, stay safe. Be well. I will be joining you in continuing to 😷mask.

@Primary_Immune As of today we no longer need to wear a mask where I live. 
But as a person with Primary Immunodeficiency, mask wearing was life changing. I went over 2 years without pneumonia and all my life had it several times a year. My mask stays on.

🦠🇮🇱
Israel's 4 COVID waves:
🗓Ô∏èMarch 2020 to Today
The first 3 waves seem tiny compared 
to the current, now-receding wave. https://t.co/IGupgqQ3Vs

🦠🇮🇱
New cases in descent, but still at ~8,500 cases per-day.   (source: Ministry of Health dashboard) https://t.co/eUrUWGhZ5t
@Primary_Immune With Omicron BA.2 "loose and without a strap", I totally agree.
